LanguageData.ArachnaeFighter_Swarm_Claws_Part.label: warrior's sickle limbs
LanguageData.ArachnaeFighter_Swarm_Claws_Part.descrip: A secondary limb created from the genes of the Arachne warrior species. The colonist can manipulate it like a weapon and use it against incoming enemies.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Myrmecocystus_Tail_Par: The tail of the honeycan species
The tail of the honeycan species

A tail created from the genes of the Arachne Honeypot species. A number of additional organs severely impact the colonist's natural physiological system, but in exchange it gains the ability to produce Arachne Nectar. Modified colonists will produce 5 units of Arachne Nectar per day.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Skyraider_Wings_Part.d: These wings are made from the genes of the Arachne sky species.As they are not compatible with the colonists' physique, they cannot fly constantly, but they can stay in the air for short periods of time.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Smokepop_Armor_Part.de: It is a heavily armored shell created from the genes of the Arachne Maze species, and is formed from the shoulders to the upper body.It provides solid defense, but it greatly reduces its movement speed.
A head shell created from the genes of the Arachne shield species that provides some protection and also secretes chitin. Modified colonists produce 10 pieces of chitin per day.
